Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.balancer

Interface ClusterInfoProvider

All Superinterfaces:
ConfigurationObserver
All Known Implementing Classes:
MasterClusterInfoProvider
@Private public interface ClusterInfoProvider extends ConfigurationObserver
This is the cluster we want to balance. It provides methods to let us get the information we want.

      boolean isOffPeakHour()
      Test whether we are in off peak hour.

      For peak and off peak hours we may have different cost for the same balancing operation.
